AddMemberToGroup.name: AddMemberToGroup
AddMemberToGroup.description:
Grants permission to add a member to a group in the directory that AWS SSO provides
                                                by default

CompleteVirtualMfaDeviceRegistration.name: CompleteVirtualMfaDeviceRegistration
CompleteVirtualMfaDeviceRegistration.description: Grants permission to complete the creation process of a virtual MFA device

CreateAlias.name: CreateAlias
CreateAlias.description: Grants permission to create an alias for the directory that AWS SSO provides by default

CreateBearerToken.name: CreateBearerToken
CreateBearerToken.description: Grants permission to create a bearer token for a given provisioning tenant

CreateExternalIdPConfigurationForDirecto.name: CreateExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
CreateExternalIdPConfigurationForDirecto.description: Grants permission to create an External Identity Provider configuration for the directory

CreateGroup.name: CreateGroup
CreateGroup.description: Grants permission to create a group in the directory that AWS SSO provides by default

CreateProvisioningTenant.name: CreateProvisioningTenant
CreateProvisioningTenant.description: Grants permission to create a provisioning tenant for a given directory

CreateUser.name: CreateUser
CreateUser.description: Grants permission to create a user in the directory that AWS SSO provides by default

DeleteBearerToken.name: DeleteBearerToken
DeleteBearerToken.description: Grants permission to delete a bearer token

DeleteExternalIdPCertificate.name: DeleteExternalIdPCertificate
DeleteExternalIdPCertificate.description: Grants permission to delete the given external IdP certificate

DeleteExternalIdPConfigurationForDirecto.name: DeleteExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
DeleteExternalIdPConfigurationForDirecto.description:
Grants permission to delete an External Identity Provider configuration associated
                                                with the directory

DeleteGroup.name: DeleteGroup
DeleteGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a group from the directory that AWS SSO provides by default

DeleteMfaDeviceForUser.name: DeleteMfaDeviceForUser
DeleteMfaDeviceForUser.description: Grants permission to delete a MFA device by device name for a given user

DeleteProvisioningTenant.name: DeleteProvisioningTenant
DeleteProvisioningTenant.description: Grants permission to delete the provisioning tenant

DeleteUser.name: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.description: Grants permission to delete a user from the directory that AWS SSO provides by default

DescribeDirectory.name: DescribeDirectory
DescribeDirectory.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the directory that AWS SSO provides
                                                by default

DescribeGroups.name: DescribeGroups
DescribeGroups.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about a group from the directory that AWS
                                                SSO provides by default

DescribeUser.name: DescribeUser
DescribeUser.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about a user from the directory that AWS
                                                SSO provides by default

DescribeUsers.name: DescribeUsers
DescribeUsers.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about user from the directory that AWS SSO
                                                provides by default

DisableExternalIdPConfigurationForDirect.name: DisableExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
DisableExternalIdPConfigurationForDirect.description:
Grants permission to disable authentication of end users with an External Identity
                                                Provider

DisableUser.name: DisableUser
DisableUser.description: Grants permission to deactivate a user in the directory that AWS SSO provides by default

EnableExternalIdPConfigurationForDirecto.name: EnableExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
EnableExternalIdPConfigurationForDirecto.description:
Grants permission to enable authentication of end users with an External Identity
                                                Provider

EnableUser.name: EnableUser
EnableUser.description: Grants permission to activate user in the directory that AWS SSO provides by default

GetAWSSPConfigurationForDirectory.name: GetAWSSPConfigurationForDirectory
GetAWSSPConfigurationForDirectory.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the AWS SSO Service Provider configurations for the
                                                directory

ImportExternalIdPCertificate.name: ImportExternalIdPCertificate
ImportExternalIdPCertificate.description: Grants permission to import the IdP certificate used for verifying external IdP responses

IsMemberInGroup.name: IsMemberInGroup
IsMemberInGroup.description:
Grants permission to check if a member is a part of the group in the directory that
                                                AWS SSO provides by default

ListBearerTokens.name: ListBearerTokens
ListBearerTokens.description: Grants permission to list bearer tokens for a given provisioning tenant

ListExternalIdPCertificates.name: ListExternalIdPCertificates
ListExternalIdPCertificates.description: Grants permission to list the external IdP certificates of a given directory and IdP

ListExternalIdPConfigurationsForDirector.name: ListExternalIdPConfigurationsForDirectory
ListExternalIdPConfigurationsForDirector.description:
Grants permission to list all the External Identity Provider configurations created
                                                for the directory

ListGroupsForUser.name: ListGroupsForUser
ListGroupsForUser.description:
Grants permission to list groups for a user from the directory that AWS SSO provides
                                                by default

ListMembersInGroup.name: ListMembersInGroup
ListMembersInGroup.description:
Grants permission to retrieve all members that are part of a group in the directory
                                                that AWS SSO provides by default

ListMfaDevicesForUser.name: ListMfaDevicesForUser
ListMfaDevicesForUser.description:
Grants permission to list all active MFA devices and their MFA device metadata for
                                                a user

ListProvisioningTenants.name: ListProvisioningTenants
ListProvisioningTenants.description: Grants permission to list provisioning tenants for a given directory

RemoveMemberFromGroup.name: RemoveMemberFromGroup
RemoveMemberFromGroup.description:
Grants permission to remove a member that is part of a group in the directory that
                                                AWS SSO provides by default

SearchGroups.name: SearchGroups
SearchGroups.description: Grants permission to search for groups within the associated directory

SearchUsers.name: SearchUsers
SearchUsers.description: Grants permission to search for users within the associated directory

StartVirtualMfaDeviceRegistration.name: StartVirtualMfaDeviceRegistration
StartVirtualMfaDeviceRegistration.description: Grants permission to begin the creation process of virtual mfa device

UpdateExternalIdPConfigurationForDirecto.name: UpdateExternalIdPConfigurationForDirectory
UpdateExternalIdPConfigurationForDirecto.description:
Grants permission to update an External Identity Provider configuration associated
                                                with the directory

UpdateGroup.name: UpdateGroup
UpdateGroup.description:
Grants permission to update information about a group in the directory that AWS SSO
                                                provides by default

UpdatePassword.name: UpdatePassword
UpdatePassword.description:
Grants permission to update a password by sending password reset link via email or
                                                generating one time password for a user in the directory that AWS SSO provides by
                                                default

UpdateUser.name: UpdateUser
UpdateUser.description:
Grants permission to update user information in the directory that AWS SSO provides
                                                by default

VerifyEmail.name: VerifyEmail
VerifyEmail.description: Grants permission to verify an email address of an User
